wiki.bio_text: Following the events of the M-Day, several mutants lost their powers, including several students from the [[Xavier Institute]] and the main squads ([[New Mutants]] and [[Hellions (squad)]]). The remaining members (who remained with his powers) were recruited for a trainee team of X-Men.
wiki.bio:
Following the events of the M-Day, several mutants lost their powers, including several students from the [[Xavier Institute]] and the main squads ([[New Mutants]] and [[Hellions (squad)]]). The remaining members (who remained with his powers) were recruited for a trainee team of X-Men.
The team faced many enemies, like: reverend [[William Stryker]]; [[Nimrod]]; [[Predator X]]; [[Belasco]], among others. 

Recently, after the confrontations with [[Lady Deathstrike]] (and her Reavers); [[Purifiers]]; Predator X and [[Marauders]], Hellion was severely wounded; X-23 joined [[X-Force]]; the members dispersed, and the New X-Men team disbanded.
